p.s: I have been thinking a lot about your statement and opinion to student exchanges and from my point of view it is a little bit different.
The most obvious pro of making an exchange is to improve your skills of ana foreign language is speaking and writing.
Even if it costs a lot of money, you travel a lot, see towns, nature and culture which you can't see on your own at your homeland.
You can make friends, live like the people there and learn much about the country and its education system.
These all pros have a much more weight than the con with the money, because the experience you make is priceless.
